about_the_game:
6 wallpapers provided as 4K (3840x2160) png files. 4 images selected from illustrations found in GEARSHIFTERS, 1 map of the game world and 1 mosaic of characters.
NOTE: 2 images contain very mild spoilers, so enjoy with caution!

name: Gearshifters - Wallpapers
